00009 //Set unix/osx/win32 definitions
00010 #if defined _WIN32 || defined __WIN32__ || defined WIN32 || defined __CYGWIN__
00011 #  undef WIN32
00012 #  define WIN32 1
00013 #  ifdef _DEBUG
00014 #      undef DEBUG
00015 #      define DEBUG 1
00016 #  endif
00017 #elif defined macintosh || defined __APPLE__ || defined __APPLE_CC__

00019 #else
00020 #  define UNIX 1
00021 #endif

00041

00055 typedef unsigned char  uchar;
00056 typedef unsigned short ushort;
00057 
00058 //Universal types describing image components
00059 typedef uchar sample_t; //A singe sample (R or G or B)
00060 
00061 #pragma pack(1)
00062 
00063 struct rgb_t
00064 {
00065     union
00066     {
00067         struct { sample_t r, g, b; };
00068         sample_t samples[3];
00069     };
00070 };
00071 
00072 #pragma pack()
00073 
00074 typedef rgb_t  *line_t; //A scanline of RGB pixels
00075 typedef line_t *image_t; //A 2-dimensional image of RGB pixels
